successes.title: Bring Penny Arcade's Automata to Life
successes.description: With your help, Automata can finally be made into a live action web series.

Pledges.description: Get a "thank you" in the credits, and all the delicious production updates via Kickstarter.
Get an HD digital download of the full series upon release.  All 5 episodes will be delivered to you at once to engineer an optimal binge viewing scenario.  Includes all previous rewards.

Get a signed Blu-Ray of the series, loaded with cool extras.  Discs are still cool guys!!! This reward also gets you a PDF collection of all three Automata comic storylines. Includes all previous rewards.

Get a full sized movie poster from Automata, In this case, that means a 27" x 40"  "One Sheet" from an alternate universe where Automata gets a huge theatrical release.  Includes all previous rewards.

A Collection Of Movie Stills! Receive 10 full color stills from the movie, signed and numbered by Director Van Alan and Automata creators Gabe and Tycho of Penny Arcade.  Includes all previous rewards.

Receive a production script from the project, signed by Director Van Alan and Automata Creators Gabe and Tycho of Penny Arcade.  May or may not include doodles/bizarre observations in the margin.  Includes all previous rewards.

Get an exclusive, highly collectible Pinny Arcade pin.  I'm not kidding about the collectible part when it comes to these Kickstarter exclusive pins.  Do a search sometime for "DLC Pin Pinny Arcade."  Yeah. Includes all previous rewards.
Get a really good custom hoodie designed for the Kickstarter by Penny Arcade.  We have made things like this before, and we really, really know how to do it.  Includes all previous rewards.
Artifacts from the set! Get a random, but important prop directly from the set of Automata.  Who knows what it could be.  Something cool!  That's the main thing.  Includes all previous rewards.

Invite to a viewing party at Penny Arcade Headquarters in Redmond, Washington!  This is gonna be pretty sweet.  We've got snacks for real.  We also know all the best restaurants around here, and we know how to use them.  Includes Rewards #1-8.
Get an Associate Producer Credit on the Automata mini-series.  When your enemies see this prestigious credit, That'll show them.  Includes rewards #1-8.
Accompany a PA staff member to visit the set of Automata! Includes rewards #1-8.
